extension.description:
DOSBox emulates an IBM PC compatible computer running MS-DOS. DOSBox can be configured to run a wide range of DOS games, from CGA/Tandy/PCjr classics up to games from the Quake era.
Supported files: .exe, .com, .bat, .conf. If loading exe/com/bat the system directory will be searched for a 'dosbox.conf' file to load. If loading a *.conf file DOSBox will be loaded with the options in the config file.
License: GPLv2
